mthFlowEqnModel.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*  
00002  * File: mthFlowEqnModel.h 
00003  * ----------------------- 
00004  * Created      03/20/99        Huic  
00005  * Header file for Flow Equation Model 
00006  * 1) calculate phase potential difference and upstream directions
00007  * 2) calcutate and assemble Jacobian matrix terms (one diagonal and two off-diagonals)
00008  * 3) calculate and assemble right hand side vector (RHS)
00009  * ------------------------------------------  
00010  * Modified by HPan, Feb. 2006:
00011  * Separate connection implementation into mthFlowEqnConnImp class 
00012  *
00013  * All data are created in this class and its inheritance classes
00014  *
00015  * mthFlowEqnConnImp class and its inheritance classes share these data:
00016  *        copy value for value-type data
00017  *    copy address for pointer type data (shared)
00018  */ 
00019 
00020 
00021 #ifndef MTHFLOWEQNMODEL_H_ 
00022 #define MTHFLOWEQNMODEL_H_ 
00023 
00024 #include "mthModelBase.h"
00025 #include "mthFlowEqnConnImp.h"
00026 #include "mthFlowEqnDiffImp.h"  
00027  
00028 class mthFlowEqnModel : public mthModelBase { 
00029 public: 
00030         mthFlowEqnModel(DataPool *dataPool); 
00031         virtual ~mthFlowEqnModel();
00032   
00033         virtual void registerData();    // register data from datapool
00034         virtual void calcInitProps();   // record old time step values
00035         virtual void calcProps();               // calculate phase potential difference 
00036  
00037         //define the friend class
00038         friend class mthFlowEqnConnImp;
00039         friend class mthFlowEqnDiffImp;
00040 
00041  protected:
00042 
00043         // --- read only variables ---
00044         int nPri, nSec; // number of primary and secondary variables
00045 
00046         const double *mPhase_Comp;      // phase and component relation (desolved?)
00047         const double *mDiff_Coeff;  // diffusion coefficients.
00048         const double *mDisper;          // dispersivity
00049 
00050 
00051         const double *mDepth, *mVol;    // cell depth and volume
00052         const double *mPoro, *mDPoro_Dp; // cell porosity and its derivatives
00053         const double *mPc, *mDPc_Ds;    // phase capillary pressure and its derivatives
00054         const double *mDens, *mDDens_Dp; // phase density and its derivatives
00055         const double *mMob, *mDMob_Dp, *mDMob_Ds; // phase mobility and its derivatives
00056         const double *mCompMass; // component mass (Black-Oil) | mole (Compositional)
00057 
00058         const int *nImpVars; // number of implicit variables at each block
00059         const int *transImp; // implicitness of transmissibility at each block
00060 
00061         // --- updated variables ---
00062         double *mPres, *mSat, *mXcp; // pressure (first phase), saturation, mole fractions
00063         double *mPotDif;        // phase potential diference for each connection
00064         double *mConDif;        // component concentration difference
00065         int *mUpstreamDir;      // phase flow upstream direction for each connecton
00066         int *mXcpUpstreamDir;   //upstream for concentration
00067 
00068         double *mOldP, *mOldS, *mOldXcp; // pres, sat, and mole frac at ole timestep 
00069         double *mOldAcc, *mOldMob;      // accumulation term and mobility at old timestep
00070 
00071         double *mDiag;  // Jacobian (diagonal) 
00072         double *mRHS;   // right hand side
00073         // $PS$: Added for Old Jacobian
00074         double *mDiagAcc;
00075 
00076         double *mMaxSnw;                //maximum gas saturation
00077         
00078         mthFlowEqnConnImp* mConnImp;
00079         mthFlowEqnDiffImp* mDiffImp;    //diffusion implementation
00080 
00081 
00082         // --- protected methods ---                                                            
00083         virtual void setNPriSec();      // set number of primary and secondary variables
00084         virtual void resetToZero();             // set Jacobian and RHS terms to zero   
00085         virtual void calcPhasePotDifAndUpStrDir()=0; // calculate phase potential diff and upstream dir 
00086         virtual void calcConnDifAndUpStrDir()=0; // calculate phase potential diff and upstream dir     
00087 
00088         
00089         virtual void createData();      // create data  
00090 
00091 private:
00092   
00093 };
00094 #endif
